snippet: Though Mitt Romney seems remarkably at ease, some of the conversation - about, for instance, the horses he owns with his wife - may not help him combat his wealthy, out-of-touch image.
abstract: Though Mitt Romney seems remarkably at ease, some of the conversation - about, for instance, the horses he owns with his wife - may not help him combat his wealthy, out-of-touch image.

headline.main: Leaked Outtake Video Offers Glimpse of Relaxed Romney
